subtitle: There is this underlying pervasive feeling that everything that I am looking at is actually myself
What is the body once I have understood I am not the body
When we start on the spiritual path, many, many people if not most are wanting to be
free of something Free of their humanness, free of suffering,
free of whatever it is. But the discovery, at least as it seems to
reveal itself here is that eventually we come back to
It’s not about being free from life, it’s about being free to experience this life
However, in all those dimensions. And some are beautiful and some are quite
challenging
What really happened was that a part of me died.
In that moment There is not better way of saying it. The
child actually died. Because it was too overwhelming, too much
pain
But you cannot refuse to accept reality
There has been a phase which was very much about the awakening of the heart
Coming to the recognition of the universal consciousness
And within that the complete unity with God.
Being Deepak is less and less Deepak
One of the habits of the old story that has taken me a lot of time to heal from is the
habit of being right.
I used to be very easily drawn into maybe a defensive posture, at least trying to prove myself right.
They are just layers of feelings and sensations There was never anybody living there in the
first place There was never anybody living in a sensation
or a feeling.
But it is only trough that, for me, trough deeply, deeply loving myself, that I can realize
that there is no me.
Everything is simultaneously co arising, this entity and the entity I am speaking to, the
people that are watching,
But the coming together of everything is like
the appearance of the void realization and the heart realization is coming deeply into
my human.
There is no refusal of the moment, and that is the freedom.
The greatest beauty of all of that is actually
the human being living it’s intimacy with everything
Love is the anchor
Is the sweetness which…
hum… yeah…
(laughter)… I don’t even know how to describe it…
You can’t even talk about love, you know love.
Something has been born out of this cosmic womb every moment
It’s a big mystery It could be that our power to conceive and
understand and make meaning will always, always, fall short of reality.
We had all these ideas of what is like to wake up to our true nature…
It’s just coming back. A cup of tea, a conversation at lunch time.
It‘s nothing extraordinary except the extraordinary is constantly here in the ordinary.
We become whole again and we realize who we are. We are not robots, we are not machines,
not computers but there is something else. What is it?
I don’t know. I guess each of us has to discover
That this reality was not born and will not die and that we can actually explore that
in our direct experience Once we really do that, as a community of
people hopefully bigger and bigger then there is a paradigm shift because our culture does
not live according to that.
In sitting in the silence The heart comes alive
And there is just…
…love!
